---
title: "Exclusion Report"
output: html_document
---

```{R}

maf_list <- vector()
info_list <- vector()
files_list <- vector()
both_list <- vector()


for(file in list.files("/scratch/hpc2862/CAMH/jen/Output/snp-stats/KIS3_AA")){

	r <- data.table::fread(paste0("/scratch/hpc2862/CAMH/jen/Output/snp-stats/KIS3_AA/", file), h = T, data.table = F)
	maf <- sum(r$MAF < 0.01)
	info <- sum(r$information < 0.4)
	both <- sum(r$MAF < 0.01 & r$information < 0.4)

	maf_list <- c(maf_list, maf)
	info_list <- c(info_list, info)
	files_list <- c(files_list, file)
	both_list <- c(both_list, both)
}

df <- data.frame(Files = files_list, LowMAF = maf_list, LowINFO = info_list, Both = both_list)
knitr::kable(df)
```
